contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|dreadnought}} The '''[[dreadnought]]''' was the predominant type of battleship in the early 20th century. '''Dreadnought''' may also refer to: * [[Dreadnought (comics)]] * [[Dreadnought (guitar type)]] In '''ships''': * [[English ship Dreadnought (1573)|English ship ''Dreadnought'' (1573)]], a 41-gun ship * [[HMS Dreadnought (1654)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1654)]], a 52-gun third-rate ship of the line * [[HMS Dreadnought (1691)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1691)]], a 60-gun fourth-rate ship of the line * [[HMS Dreadnought (1742)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1742)]], a 60-gun fourth-rate ship of the line * [[HMS Dreadnought (1801)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1801)]], a 98-gun second-rate * [[HMS Dreadnought (1875)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1875)]], a battleship * [[HMS Dreadnought (1906)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (1906)]], a revolutionary battleship * [[HMS Dreadnought (S101)|HMS ''Dreadnought'' (S101)]], a nuclear-powered submarine launched in 1960 * [[USS Dreadnought (SP-584)|USS ''Dreadnought'' (SP-584)]], a patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1919 In '''literature''': * [[Dreadnought (book)|''Dreadnought'' (book)]], a 1991 book by Robert K. Massie * ''[[Workers' Dreadnought]]'', a newspaper of the suffragettes * ''[[Dreadnought: a History of the Modern Battleship]]'', a 1975 book by [[Richard Hough]] * ''Dreadnought'', a 2010 alternate history steampunk novel by [[Cherie Priest]] * Dreadnought, a fictional warship type in Simon R. Green's [[Deathstalker (series)|"Deathstalker" series]] * Dreadnought, a fictional warship type in David Weber's [[Honor Harrington series|"Honor Harrington" series]] In '''film and television''': * [[Dreadnought (Star Trek: Voyager)|"Dreadnought" (''Star Trek: Voyager'')]], an episode of ''Star Trek: Voyager'' * ''[[Under Siege]]'' or ''Dreadnought'', a Steven Seagal film * ''Dreadnought'', a fictional spaceship in the ''[[Farscape]]'' television series In '''rail''': * ''Dreadnought'', a [[GWR 3031 Class]] locomotive between 1891 and 1915 * ''Dreadnought'', a type of suburban [[London Underground carriages|railway carriage]] used on the Metropolitan Railway and London Underground between 1910 and the early 1960s In '''games''': * [[Dreadnought (naval wargame)|''Dreadnought'' (naval wargame)]], a 1975 wargame published by Simulations Publications, Inc. * ''Dreadnought'', a fictional Soviet artillery ship in the [[Command & Conquer: Red Alert series|''Command & Conquer: Red Alert'' series]] * ''Dreadnought'', a fictional unit of the [[Space Marines (Warhammer 40,000)|Space Marines]] in ''Warhammer 40,000'' * ''Dreadnought'' and ''Dreadnought X'', raid rewards in ''[[Battle Pirates]]'' * Phyrexian Dreadnought, a fictional construct from ''Magic: The Gathering'''s [[Mirage (Magic: The Gathering)|''Mirage'']] Setting * Ur-Quan Dreadnought, a fictional starship of the [[Kzer-Za#Ur-Quan Dreadnought|Kzer-Za]] in the ''Star Control'' == See also == * [[Dreadnaught (disambiguation)]] * [[Dreadnoks]] {{Disambiguation}} [[de:Dreadnought (Begriffsklärung)]] [[el:Dreadnought]] [[ja:ドレッドノート]] [[ru:Дредноут]] [[sl:Dreadnought]] [[sr:Дреднот]] [[fi:Dreadnought]] [[uk:Дредноут]]
